name: rift-vscode
description: Rift: an AI-native language server for your personal AI software engineer.

enumDescriptions: On-device model using ggml and gpt4all
rift.modelType.markdownDescription: The model provider to use. `gpt4all` and `hf` are local models. If you use `openai`, make sure that the `rift.openaiKey` setting is set to your OpenAI API key.

rift.modelName.markdownDescription: The name of the model to use. Be sure to set `#rift.modelType#` appropriately. For `gpt4all`, this is the name of the Gpt4all model. For `hf`, this is the name of a HuggingFace model. For `openai`, this is the name of the OpenAI model.

rift.modelPath.markdownDescription: The path to the model to use for on-device inference. Be sure to set `#rift.modelType#` appropriately. For `gpt4all`, this is URI of a (gpt4all model)[https://gpt4all.io/models/models.json]. For `hf`, this is the path to the weights of a (HuggingFace model)[https://huggingface.co/docs/hub/index]. For `openai`, this should be `none`.

enumDescriptions: On-device model using ggml and gpt4all
rift.chatModelType.markdownDescription: The model provider to use. `gpt4all` and `hf` are local models. If you use `openai`, make sure that the `rift.openaiKey` setting is set to your OpenAI API key.

rift.chatModelName.markdownDescription: The name of the model to use. Be sure to set `#rift.chatModelType#` appropriately. For `gpt4all`, this is the name of the Gpt4all model. For `hf`, this is the name of a HuggingFace model. For `openai`, this is the name of the OpenAI model.

rift.chatModelPath.markdownDescription: The path to the model to use for on-device inference. Be sure to set `#rift.chatModelType#` appropriately. For `gpt4all`, this is URI of a (gpt4all model)[https://gpt4all.io/models/models.json]. For `hf`, this is the path to the weights of a (HuggingFace model)[https://huggingface.co/docs/hub/index]. For `openai`, this should be `none`.

viewsWelcome.contents: Chat with a local code model.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
